#summary This page contains links and information about all of the current Matlab Codec downloads for RL-Glue.

*Notes:* To use this or any other codec, you must have RL-Glue Core installed first.

=== Available Downloads ===

 * [http://rl-glue-ext.googlecode.com/files/matlab-codec-1.0-RCFinal.tar.gz Matlab User/Dev Distribution 1.0-RCFinal] [http://code.google.com/p/rl-glue-ext/downloads/detail?name=matlab-codec-1.0-RCFinal.tar.gz (File Details)]

=== Quick Install ===
{{{
#Unpack the files
tar -zxf matlab-codec-1.0-RCFinal.tar.gz

#Start Matlab
#Change to unpacked directory
>>cd /path/to/matlab-codec-1.0-RCFinal

#Install the Codec
>>installRLGlue()

}}}
